"Dantre": "If you want to learn how to fight from me, you'll need to change your Class to Fighter at the Class Counter."
"And don't forget to pick up some of Fighter's Class Skills while you're there!"
"...Well, since you're here now, I'll tell you a bit about Fighter."
"Fighter is a Class that excels in close-range combat! Its most notable feature is its massive striking power!"
"Its attacks are a bit of an eclectic mixture. Great for putting on a show as you fight!"
"On the other hand, its attack range tends to be pretty short and narrow, so you'll need to get up close and personal with your enemies."
"Its Class Skills can help a lot with that! The one I recommend getting first is Limit Break."
"Well, the best way to learn it is to just get out there and do it! I'll assign you some objectives so you can try it out!"
